## StateListener.callback() method

The function to call when the state value updates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
callback(currentValue: T): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  currentValue | T | The current state value |

<b>Returns:</b>

any
